data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo, Chile that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo, Chile
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 21,709 believers in Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo, Chile.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo, Chile.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Spirit, of the 60,457 people in the state of Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.focus_label: Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo, Chile

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Aisén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo, Chile need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
